title: How to Get a SWAT Truck in Need for Speed: Most Wanted (PC)

steps.headline: Visit the car changer’s download page.
steps.description: Open a new window on your browser and go to the Mediafire website and search for the Most Wanted Car Changer.

steps.headline: Click the green button marked “Download.” This will download the file MostWantedCarChanger.exe onto your computer.
Run the car changer app.
steps.description: Once the download is complete, go to your Downloads folder (for Windows, this is usually C:\Users\<User Name>\Downloads\). Find the app’s exe file and open it by double-clicking.

steps.headline: Click the horizontal bar at the top right corner of the car changer window.
steps.description: This will minimize the car changer app so you can launch the NFS game. Remember that Most Wanted Car Changer must be running as you play the game so you can get the SWAT truck.

steps.headline: Launch the game.
steps.description: You can launch the game from the Start menu (Start button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Most Wanted) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon. The game will launch directly into the game world, resuming your racing career from where you last stopped.

steps.headline: Press the combination Alt + Enter on your keyboard.
steps.description: This will put NFS: MW 2012 in window mode, allowing you to use the mouse and the minimize button to switch between the game and the Most Wanted Car Changer application.

steps.headline: Click the Most Wanted Car Changer application.
steps.description: Since you minimized the program, it should be on your taskbar.

steps.headline: Click the down arrow next to “Select car.” A list containing all the cars in NFS: MW 2012 will appear.
Choose “S.W.A.T” from the list.
steps.description: You will have to scroll down a bit on the drop-down menu to find this option.

steps.headline: Click the NFS: MW 2012 window to return to the game.
steps.description: Now you can change the car you are currently driving to the SWAT truck you selected in the Car Changer.

steps.headline: Crash the car you are driving.
steps.description: To do this, drive very fast (Up Arrow key to accelerate, Left and Right Arrow keys to steer left and right respectively) and hit another vehicle, or a wall, hard. After the crash, you will respawn in the SWAT truck.

text: Downloading the Car Changer App Visit the car changer’s download page. Open a new window on your browser and go to the Mediafire website and search for the Most Wanted Car Changer. Click the green button marked “Download.” This will download the file MostWantedCarChanger.exe onto your computer.  Run the car changer app. Once the download is complete, go to your Downloads folder (for Windows, this is usually C:\Users\<User Name>\Downloads\). Find the app’s exe file and open it by double-clicking. Click the horizontal bar at the top right corner of the car changer window. This will minimize the car changer app so you can launch the NFS game. Remember that Most Wanted Car Changer must be running as you play the game so you can get the SWAT truck. Switching to the SWAT Truck Launch the game. You can launch the game from the Start menu (Start button >> All Programs >> Electronic Arts >> Need for Speed Most Wanted) or from the desktop by double-clicking its icon. The game will launch directly into the game world, resuming your racing career from where you last stopped. Press the combination Alt + Enter on your keyboard. This will put NFS: MW 2012 in window mode, allowing you to use the mouse and the minimize button to switch between the game and the Most Wanted Car Changer application. Click the Most Wanted Car Changer application. Since you minimized the program, it should be on your taskbar. Click the down arrow next to “Select car.” A list containing all the cars in NFS: MW 2012 will appear.  Choose “S.W.A.T” from the list. You will have to scroll down a bit on the drop-down menu to find this option. Click the “Freeze” button. This will confirm your selection. Click the NFS: MW 2012 window to return to the game. Now you can change the car you are currently driving to the SWAT truck you selected in the Car Changer. Crash the car you are driving. To do this, drive very fast (Up Arrow key to accelerate, Left and Right Arrow keys to steer left and right respectively) and hit another vehicle, or a wall, hard. After the crash, you will respawn in the SWAT truck.
